headline: Is Home Depot’s Creator Portal Strategy Reframing the Digital Growth Narrative for HD?
summary: Earlier in December 2025, Home Depot launched The Home Depot Creator portal, a centralized platform that connects digital home-improvement creators with the retailer and its suppliers, offering shoppable links, training, campaign opportunities and storefront tools to help monetize DIY, décor and project content. This move signals Home Depot’s push to turn social and creator-driven inspiration into a direct product discovery and sales engine across both DIY and professional customer...
